sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- <TheEmployeeList
    :showEmployeeDetailFunction="onShowEmployeeDetail"
    title="Nhân viên"
  ></TheEmployeeList>
  <EmployeeDetail
    v-if="showEmployeeDetail"
    @onClose="onCloseEmployeeDetail" 
  ></EmployeeDetail> -->
  <router-view></router-view>
</template>
<script>
import EmployeeDetail from "@/views/employee/EmployeeDetail.vue";
import TheEmployeeList from "@/views/employee/EmployeeList.vue";

export default {
  name: "ContainerEmployee",
  components: {
    EmployeeDetail,
    TheEmployeeList,
  },
  methods: {
    // Show thông tin nhân viên
    onShowEmployeeDetail() {
      this.showEmployeeDetail = true;
    },
    // Đóng thông tin nhân viên

    onCloseEmployeeDetail() {
      this.showEmployeeDetail = false;
    },
    // Show Dialog

    onShowDialog() {
      this.showDialog = true;
    },
    // Đóng DIalog
    onCloseDialog() {
      this.showDialog = false;
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      showEmployeeDetail: false,
      showDialog: false,
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
